name: RoverRunner
description:
Controls

****************************

R - Reset Game

Space - Jump

****************************

RoverRunner is an 2D Endless Runner with a twist! The player has to collect coins while traversing a planet. 

Beware of ramps and gravity wells that flip you over or throw you out into space!

The planet-based physics made this exploration of creating an endless runner quite interesting to work on.

I am still deciding on design choices such as multiple planets, limit player's max velocity (no limit results in some fun planet orbiting),  and automatic player rotation orientation.

This prototype will receive one final update within the next few weeks.
